addoninfo.title: projectM
addoninfo.description: projectM is an awesome music visualizer. There is nothing better in the world of Unix. projectM's greatness comes from the hard work of the community. Users like you can create presets that connect music with incredible visuals. Try it! projectM Visualization is an LGPL'ed reimplementation of Milkdrop under OpenGL All projectM requires is a video card with 3D acceleration and your favorite music.
addoninfo.author: Team XBMC
